UpdateFilters._LimitPriceDataWithinTime_Hour_COMMENT1_: set -1 for use all history data (around a week)
UpdateFilters._LimitPriceDataWithinTime_Hour_COMMENT2_: If there is no data to use within time, Using 24h avg price instead, skip the item to update if no data at all to use

UpdatePricesFromTradersForBannedItems._COMMENT_: If LowPricedItemsOnly is false, Every banned items are set by highest price from traders even it's more cheaper than before
